db:abstract.db:para: A widget-based application that uses a dynamically loaded state machine to implement a traffic light.

db:article.db:para: Traffic Light Example (Dynamic) demonstrates how to connect to the active properties of a state in a dynamically loaded state machine.
The UI is created using Qt Widgets.

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.
